title: Quiche with peas, ham and mint
ingredients: ['1 (23cm) pastry case', '200g frozen garden peas', '1 pinch salt', '1 pinch sugar', '1 knob of butter', '2 large eggs', '150g ham, diced', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh mint', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '175g natural yoghurt', '1 handful of grated cheese, such as Gruyere or Cheddar']
